name: Basilisk Cutter
description: As for most Demon Corp hulls, this provided an additional weapon to increase damage. Proved to be a favorate for PvP as the introduction of Armored Thrusters allowed it to move faster than previous Cutters.
obtaining: Can be obtained in the Demon Corps campaign mission. Mk ups can be found in lv 60+ Vsec as well as Cutter supply runs.
tips-builds: Typically used with Infernal Gatling rays and Nova rays as weapons of choice in PvP battles. Armored Thrusters helped it gain an edge in combat.
author: Anonymous65
